name: Moving Soul
description:
The player embodies a soul who must take possession of boxes that give him access to different capacity. By exploring, solving puzzles and navigating through a disused dungeon. Main mechanic

By pressing R the player leaves a cube. When the player leaves his cube, he enters wisp mode which means that the player can now go through objects until the wisp finds a new cube or re-enter the old cube.

Cube capacity

Cubes have unique capacity based on their tape color and sticker which has emissive to be clearly distinct from each and other and still be differentiate even with color blindness. These capacities will help the player clear the puzzles. When the tape doesn't glow and the color looks beige, it means that the cube has basic stats.
